comments.body: From what I see this should be enough or is there a particular reason you used `getterName` ?

I've just copied its usage from `newText` methods:
https://github.com/scalameta/metals/blob/99367756fe15268a192cd2e194f27e9e2f643fef/mtags/src/main/scala-2/scala/meta/internal/pc/completions/InterpolatorCompletions.scala#L110-L113

I don't know if `getterName` usage is required here, but at least it should use `dropLocal` since `s.sym.name.decoded` may contain space at the end.
